other_tests.findings: Biochemical findings including urinary steroid metabolite analysis by gas chromatography-mass spectrometry were suggestive of 11OHD in all patients.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Subsequently, the concentrations of 11-deoxycortisol and androgens normalized.

other_tests.findings: CYP11B1 mutation analysis revealed compound heterozygosity in patient 1 and a homozygous mutation in patient 2.

other_tests.date: Patient 1: Age 10 years; Patient 2: Age 14 years
other_tests.findings: Hormonal analysis revealed a mildly elevated 17OHP, elevated androstenedione, and significantly increased concentration of 11-deoxycortisol.
